name: Moonshot (itch) (wooyme)
description:
I speent a weekend programming it, because I learnt "Game off 2020" last week.

When I saw the theme "Moonshot", I immediately thought out "Land on moon", so players can build their spaceship and make it land on the moon.

I'm a programmer but it's my first time making a game. I speent about half day to learn LibGdx and been learning while doing in the full weekend.
